channel.title: Simona-Biduan on Tomi Mulhartono
channel.description: Recent content in Simona-Biduan on Tomi Mulhartono

item.title: Innovative Stakeholder Engagement: Simona Biduan's Complaint Management System
item.description: Delving into the Challenges of Stakeholder Complaint Management As a Full Stack Developer at PT Motiolabs Digital Indonesia, I had the opportunity to contribute to the development of an innovative web application: Sistem Monitoring Pelayanan Bidang Informasi dan Pengaduan Stakeholders (SIMONA BIDUAN). SIMONA BIDUAN emerged as a comprehensive software solution to manage and track stakeholder complaints, particularly within the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia (Kemenkumham RI).
